motherduck_api_key.title: MotherDuck Access Token
motherduck_api_key.description: Enter your MotherDuck access token. You can find your token at https://app.motherduck.com/ under Settings > Access Tokens.

destination_path.title: Database Path
destination_path.description: The path to your MotherDuck database. Use 'md:' to connect to the default database, 'md:<database_name>' for a specific MotherDuck database, or a file path for a local DuckDB file.

schema.title: Default Schema
schema.description: Enter the name of the default schema. Defaults to 'main' if not specified.

raw_data_schema.title: Airbyte Internal Table Schema Name
raw_data_schema.description: Airbyte will use this schema for various internal tables. Defaults to "airbyte_internal".
